text:
September 30, 1957
From: Burton Paulu
To: FAEB Board of Directors
dal© Adkins
Harry Skornia
I shall attend a meeting of the Institute
Advisory Committee In Columbus, Ohio, on October 10,
which Keith Tyler has called to appraise the 1957
Institute for Education by Radio-Television, and to
lay plans for the 1958 Institute.
I assume that NAEB will want to have at least
half a day’s program at the Institute, and shall so
specify. Since this planning session will take
place prior to our Board meeting in Columbus,
however, I shall not have the benefit of your advice
unless you send me letters now. I do hope I hear
from all of you.
BP:ds
